attributes.action: not pay any end of term allowances to MP's that are standing down at the next election due to excessive expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the MP's that are standing down due to excessive/inappropriate expense claims have already benefited from the taxpayer they should not be handed further thousands of pounds in taxpayers cash as a golden handshake.
Why should we, the taxpayer further enrich them when they should be prosecuted as the normal person would?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
